description.default: Excerpt-based progressive learning, chunk-based progressive learning, multi-line selection on mobile, double-tap to show menu on mobile, word highlighting with explanations, sentence splitting, split block by pressing Enter, merge blocks, word flashcards, multi-line cloze deletion, multi-line card creation, Daily Card, display pinyin for content
description.zh_CN: 【已开源】摘抄式渐进学习、分片式渐进学习、移动端双击多行选择、划词解释、断句拆分、按回车拆分块、合并块、单词闪卡、多行挖空、多行制卡、Daily Card、显示拼音
